Title: The Avengers
Writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
Plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superheroes to save the planet from Loki and his army.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 57 nominations.
